name: Red Alert: Hail to the Great Yuri
summary: The story background of "Red Alert" is set up on the real modern battlefield. Various mysterious military organizations in the world appear one by one, trying to unify the world through war. As a military commander trained by the country. In order to defeat The evil forces of other countries, you establish your own military base and develop yourself to fight against them, and also establish contacts with other commanders, communicate information, arrange troops, and fight the enemy together.
